articles.content: No, the 2023 BMW M2 isn't available (yet) in a video game where you can customize the heck out of the performance coupe. These official images depict Munich's smallest M car equipped with numerous M … [+1674 chars]

articles.title: Surface Pro 9 Hands-On (Plus Surface Studio & Laptop 5) - CNET
articles.description: New colors and a 5G option come to some of Microsoft's Surface PCs.Read more on CNET: https://www.cnet.com/tech/computing/everything-microsoft-just-announced...
